title: Kimberly Fain, “Black Hollywood: From Butlers to Superheroes, the Changing Role of African American Men in the Movies” (Praeger, 2015)
description:
While black men have been portrayed in film for over a hundred years, they have often been stereotyped or portrayed very badly.
